1499820.name: VR Graffiti World
1499820.description:
If you search for relieving stress to reach a peaceful mind, this the best satisfying Virtual Reality game for you!

You can paint everything you can imagine like Trains, Underground-Trains, Trams, Trucks, Street Buildings, Police cars, and many many more without getting busted by the cops in an amazing 3d Virtual reality world. Encourage yourself to become a graffiti artist and enjoy the ride. It’s a satisfactory game that is comforting, amusing, enjoying, and also simply providing inner peace. With easy graffiti drawings and easy painting skills, you will also gain a taste of deviant art.

Apart from Graffiti, You can even paint on different models of cars from your VR garage.
Let's download VR Graffiti World.
1499820.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
